name: Proteolytic Enzyme Blend (Systemic Enzymes)
description: Systemic enzyme formulations (bromelain, trypsin, chymotrypsin, papain, rutin) taken on empty stomach for systemic anti-inflammatory, fibrinolytic, and immune-modulating effects. Used in German and European integrative medicine for decades. Wobenzym is the most studied brand.

dosage.notes: MUST take on empty stomach (1hr before or 2hr after food). Enteric coating protects from stomach acid. Wobenzym N most studied. German clinical standard.

keyFindings: Reduced post-surgical inflammation comparable to NSAIDs in German clinical trials
Improved recovery time in athletes (reduced muscle soreness)
Immune modulation â€” reduced autoimmune symptom severity in open-label studies
